properties.title: Calandahütte SAC
properties.description: The local mountain of Chur towers above the city, and so does, 1500 m above the Rhine, the Calanda hut with a far-reaching view. It has completely maintained its simple and rustic character. The access can be considerably shortened by driving up to Vazer Alp. The cabin is a starting point for ascents of the Calanda summits and for high route hikes on both sides. An attractive destination, not to be underestimated by mountain bikers.
properties.city: Grison Alps, Glarus – St. Gallen – Appenzell
properties.place: Grison Alps, Glarus – St. Gallen – Appenzell
